author: timbeiko
content:
I just published my follow up to "Reconfiguring AllCoreDevs" that reflects on our approach to rough consensus, what happened with EOF, and practical ways to improve the process going forward:  https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/community-consensus-fork-headliners-acd-working-groups/24088

This took longer than I expected, so while I added it to tomorrow's ACD agenda, I don't expect people to have reviewed it by then üòÖ 

See you all in ~11h, and congrats again on Pectra, everyone üéâ !

author: timbeiko
content:
Full ACDE summary coming later, but here are the main action items:

1. We agreed to SFI [EIP-7935](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7935), with the implication that other EIPs related to increasing the gas limit will be added to Fusaka
2. In that vein, we agreed to CFI [EIP-7934](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7934)
3. On Monday's call, we'll agree to the scope for `fusaka-devnet-1`. Client teams, please review the SFI list and prepare your "sorted preferences" for CFI -> SFI by the call: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7607#considered-for-inclusion

The testing team will also review the CFI list and share their thoughts on the testing burden for each EIP before then. 

And, once more, congrats everyone on shipping Pectra üéâ!
